Media Insider: Five for 2025 - Media leaders on year ahead: TVNZ’s Jodi O’Donnell, RNZ’s Paul Thompson, The Spinoff’s Duncan Greive, Pacific Media Network’s Don Mann, Pead PR’s Deborah Pead and Together’s Penelope Brown https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/media-insider/media-insider- Five-for-2025-media-leaders-on-year-ahead-tvnzs-jodi-odonnell-rnzs-paul-thomp儿子衍生品-邓肯-格雷夫-太平洋媒体网络-唐-曼-佩德-prs-黛博拉-佩德-和-佩内洛普-布朗/M2UHJEAMU5DLPC4WG23SZ2N3GU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/media-insider/media-insider- Five-for-2025-media-leaders-on-year-ahead-tvnzs-jodi-odonnell-rnzs-paul-thomp儿子衍生品-邓肯-格雷夫-太平洋媒体网络-唐-曼-佩德-prs-黛博拉-佩德-和-佩内洛普-布朗/M2UHJEAMU5DLPC4WG23SZ2N3GU/ Shayne CurrieAgency boss: 'NZ media market needs to reinvent itself'. Thu, 26 Dec 2024 17:15:23 +0000 The first part of our series on media leaders answering five questions for 2025. Today we hear from Jodi O'Donnell (TVNZ), Paul Thompson (RNZ), Duncan Greive (The Spinoff), Don Mann (Pacific Media Network), Deborah Pead (Pead PR) and Penelope Brown (Together).
